column5: Cambodia (Reuters) – More tests are needed to confirm that an American passenger from a cruise ship docked in Cambodia has the new coronavirus after she tested positive in Malaysia
column6: the MS Westerdam’s operator said on Sunday.------The 83-year-old woman was the first passenger from the MS Westerdam
column7: operated by Carnival Corp unit Holland America Inc
column8: to test positive for the virus.------“While the first results have been reported
column9: they are preliminary at this point and we are awaiting secondary testing for confirmation
column10: ” Holland America said in a statement.------Cambodian authorities called on Malaysia to review its test results.------Holland America said 236 passengers and 747 crew remained aboard the vessel
column11: which is docked in the Cambodian port of Sihanoukville.------It arrived on Thursday carrying 1
column12: 455 passengers and 802 crew. It had spent two weeks at sea after being turned away by Japan
column15: the Philippines and Thailand.------The passengers were tested regularly on board and Cambodia also tested 20 once it docked. None was found to have the new coronavirus that has killed more than 1
column17: the vast majority in China.------The American woman flew to Malaysia on Friday from Cambodia along with 144 others from the ship
column18: the Malaysian health ministry said in a statement
column19: adding that she was in stable condition.------The woman’s husband had shown symptoms but tested negative
column20: it said. The couple were the only ones among the 145 to show symptoms
column21: the ministry said.------Cambodia’s government said its own tests had been done in collaboration with the World Health Organisation and the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.------“The Ministry of Health requests the Malaysian authorities to review the results of the test
column22: ” Cambodia’s Ministry of Health said in statement (below).------There are widespread fears that cruise ships around Asia may be spreading the virus. The biggest cluster outside China has been on the Diamond Princess
column23: quarantined off Japan’s Yokohama. Out of about 3
column25: 285 people have tested positive and been sent to hospital.------Vietnam turned back two ships on Friday.------The American woman’s case brings the total number of confirmed coronavirus cases in Malaysia to 22. ------REUTERS------*of the 1254 passengers and crew who were allowed to leave the Westerdam
column27: the others were given a health questionaire.
